string-array.name: random_facts
string-array.item: The Parrot fish eats coral and poops sand. This has led to creation for many small islands and beaches of the Caribbean.
There are four bags of astronaut poop on the moon, left behind by Neil Armstrong on his Apollo mission to moon
Sloths only poop once a week. Remember to eat your fiber!
The smell of books makes some people need to poop. It\'s the Mariko Aoki phenomenon
Wombats have cube shaped poop, which they use to remember where they live.
Pandas can poop up to 48 pounds per day.
All the poop generated on the US Navy’s newest Gerald R. Ford-class aircraft carrier will be vaporized by plasma.
Some of the shooting stars we see are actually astronaut poop burning up in the atmosphere.
Dubai has no sewer system. Instead they use poop trucks to haul the entire cities’ excrement away.
Penguin poop stains can be seen from space.
Poop is brown because of the breakdown of red blood cells in the intestines.
Civet coffee is $600 per pound. It?s made from excreted coffee beans of the civet, a weasel like creature.
The average human poops 2 lbs a day. A panda, 48 lbs. An elephant, 80 lbs.
Caterpillars can fling their poop 3 feet at predators.
The longest poop recorded was 25 feet.
In WWII, German tank drivers through it was good luck to drive over camel dung?so the British made explosives that looked like camel dung.
Rabbits can poop 500 pellets a day.
A third of your poop is dead bacteria.
